Programs

Saturday Pickleball Extraveganzas

A great way to enjoy the fun, fitness and friendships of pickleball at all levels of play from a first timer to highly competitive on courts allocated based on sign up for the level of play that suits you best:

  • Adults (ages 18+)
  • Must sign up in advance No drop ins.
  • Fee payable at start of the session in Cash (exact change) or Venue (preferred).

Group Play
First Timers / Beginners

Learn the basic skills, rules and how to play. Instructor will have first timers playing in 30 minutes with instruction on the basics and follow-on coaching tips for the rest of the session’s doubles play. All equipment will be provided.

Session 1: 5:00 - 6:30pm

Session 2: 6:30 – 8:00pm

Details:

  • 1.5 hours
  • $35/player
  • 4 min on one court up to 8 on two courts
Register
Group Play
Casual / Non- Competitive

Ideal for those desiring a recreational and social atmosphere for play. Must know how to play doubles and how to keep scope. All levels and abilities are welcome.

Session 1: 5:00 - 7:00pm

Session 2: 7:00 – 9:00pm

Details:

  • 2 hours
  • $15/player
  • 12 min on two courts up to 16 on two courts
Register
Group Play
Highly-Competitive

Mixed partner challenge courts (winning team stays), winners stay and split, 4 on 4 off whatever is the preference of those signed up for the session.

Session 1: 5:00 - 8:00pm

Details:

  • 3 hours
  • $15/player
  • 12 min on two courts up to 16 on two courts
Register

Clinics

Clinic
Beginner Night Out

Learn the basics of the game as we introduce you to the strokes of pickleball, rules, and scoring. All equipment is provided.

  • $150 for 6 sessions ($25/session)
  • 6 consecutive weeks, 1.5 hours per session
  • Adults (ages 18+)
  • Friday Evenings 7:30 to 9pm
Spring I
March 18th – April 22nd
Spring II
April 29th – June 3rd
Fall I
August 26 – September 30
Fall II
October 7 – November 11
Winter
January 13– February 17
Register
Clinic
Skills and Drills

When you sign up, please indicate in the comment box what level of player you are so Art can best prepare for the session.

Advanced Beginner

Looking to take the basic strokes, shot making, positioning and strategy to a new level of confidence that comes through drilling not by just playing games.

Intermediate

Have all the basic shots but realize the importance of proper technique and purposeful practice / drilling that through repetition results in muscle memory and confident play.

Advanced

Have all the basic and advance strokes and drilling is part of your weekly play.  Looking for other like-minded players.

Register

Weekly "Skills and Drills" clinics are ideal for players wanting to take their game to the next level.

  • Dinking
  • Third shot drives and drops
  • Serves
  • Service returns,
  • Overheads/lobs
  • Blocking the ball from a banger
  • Positioning on the court
  • Game strategies

Option 1 Advanced Beginner (Mon, Tue, Thu Wed or Fri):

$20/hour/player (min 4 players on one court up to 8 players on two courts ). Focus is on skill and strategy development as a whole group.  Cost includes court rental.

Option 2 Your Choice

Contact Art to schedule a time of your choosing for your group of 4 to 8.  Or schedule a private semi-priviate lesson.  Cost to be determined based on peak or off peak rental rates and number of players.

Organized for players of all levels, Beginner to Advanced.

Private Lessons

Pricing Upon Request

Prefer more individual attention to learn the sport or take your game to the next level? Private Lessons/Training are available from PPR Certified Instructor Art Shenk

Register

Meet Art

Art has been playing pickleball since Nov 2017. He is a Pickleball Professional Registry (PPR) Certified Coach / Instructor and a local USA Pickleball ambassador for Montgomery County.

He finds pickleball a unique sport for all ages that uses very basic racket / paddle skills that are easy to learn often adapted from a variety of sports previously played including table tennis, racketball, badmitten and / or tennis. 

He enjoys playing this active, low physical impact game of skill and strategy.  And finds that it can be played at all levels competitively while being a wonderful way to make new friends.Art is committed to facilitating growth of this fastest growing game in America with a focus on the developing the love for the sport in Gaithersburg Maryland.

Contact Art
